comment:
* Bluetooth LE scan callbacks. Scan results are reported using these callbacks.
 *
 * @see BluetoothLeScanner#startScan

variables.name: SCAN_FAILED_ALREADY_STARTED
variables.comment: Fails to start scan as BLE scan with the same settings is already started by the app.

variables.name: SCAN_FAILED_APPLICATION_REGISTRATION_FAILED
variables.comment: Fails to start scan as app cannot be registered.

variables.name: SCAN_FAILED_INTERNAL_ERROR
variables.comment: Fails to start scan due an internal error

variables.name: SCAN_FAILED_FEATURE_UNSUPPORTED
variables.comment: Fails to start power optimized scan as this feature is not supported.

variables.name: SCAN_FAILED_OUT_OF_HARDWARE_RESOURCES
variables.comment: Fails to start scan as it is out of hardware resources.

variables.name: SCAN_FAILED_SCANNING_TOO_FREQUENTLY
variables.comment: Fails to start scan as application tries to scan too frequently.

methods.name: public void onScanResult(int callbackType, ScanResult result)
public void onBatchScanResults(List<ScanResult> results)
methods.comment:
* Callback when batch results are delivered.
     *
     * @param results List of scan results that are previously scanned.

methods.name: public void onScanFailed(@ScanFailed int errorCode)
methods.comment:
* Callback when scan could not be started.
     *
     * @param errorCode Error code (one of SCAN_FAILED_*) for scan failure.

methodNames: public void onScanResult(int callbackType, ScanResult result)
